title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 637.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 637.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part establish qualifications for persons engaged in environmental conservation activities for agencies seeking to obtain State aid pursuant to section
3-0117
of the Environmental Conservation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
637.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
